tool_description: Verifies patient insurance coverage, benefits, and eligibility for medical services by validating insurance information and checking coverage status.

subscriber_dob.description: Primary policy holder's date of birth

relationship_to_subscriber.description: Patient's relationship to subscriber (self, spouse, child, other)

error_messages: Invalid patient ID: Patient ID must exist in the system.
Insurance company not recognized: Please verify the insurance company name.
Invalid policy format: Policy number must match the format required by the insurance provider.
Subscriber information mismatch: Subscriber name and date of birth do not match insurance records.
Invalid relationship type: Must be one of [self, spouse, child, other].
Coverage verification failed: Unable to verify active coverage for the provided policy.
usage: Provide patient ID and complete insurance information to verify coverage. Ensure all subscriber information is accurate to avoid verification failures.

verification_status.description: Coverage verification result (active, inactive, pending, error)

coverage_details.description: Summary of coverage benefits and limitations

copay_amount.description: Patient copay amount for standard visits
